scene_description_enriched: An angel, clad in a white robe with gold trim and possessing large feathered wings, wields a sword above its head, driving a group of naked figures away. The figures, appearing distressed, are being pushed towards the right of the frame. The scene is set outdoors in a grassy landscape with several trees in the background. The entire composition is framed by an ornate border with floral and foliate motifs. This scene depicts the Expulsion from the Garden of Eden, where an angel guards the entrance to paradise.
scene_interpretation: Expulsion from the Garden of Eden
